ygData.subject: Tinkering book and reciepies
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok need some help.. 1) I know books one and two have locations in Steamfont at the windmills (common knowledge) but where is book 3? and is there a book 4? I
ygData.messageBody:
Ok need some help..

1) I know books one and two have locations in Steamfont at the windmills (common knowledge)
but where is book 3? and is there a book 4?

I have all the recipies for book 3 but want the actual books so when changes are made i can find
them quickly.

2) UNDERWATER BREATHING.. well according to the patch we have this now..

I'm not sure which book yet as i can't get ingame. but i'll check books one and two however
something tells me that it's not going to be in those.. anyone HAVE 3 and can check there
and post it perhaps.. or give location of book 3?

3) PETITION/FEEDBACK/BUG the fireworks.. yes as you all know they are bad.. but it LOOKS like
the same bug that FLARE had a while ago.. so i think it's FIXABLE.. seen some posts that
said a guide saw it and laughed well all i can say is i think he didn't know he was looking
at a BUG.. that is NOT supposed to do that.. Flare had the same problem after thier 2nd major
patch.. took em 6 weeks to fix. but it's working now.. so i think it can be patched rather easily
if they know the cause.

4) Are there more books out there?? new recipies to find, etc... so far I see perhaps 2 items of any USE
in this trade.. Cams, and possibly the lockpicks. The rest are for FUN and not really needed in the
game yet.. (possibly the Stalking probes could be usefull if the duration was not 5 seconds :(


Meraxes Glibilskym, Fennin Ro
Gnomish Magician and Tinkerer
